title: Fiona Ross
content: I'm searching for fonts from Fiona Ross. It's for my exam. And I don't find any of her! I know she has something to do with. Please could someone mail some information to me.
author: mickey

comments.content:
Ross has done a lot of good non-Latin work for Linotype, with a specialty in Bengali (she's written a book on that). Here's something good:   
 [http://www.stbride.org/conference2002/NonLatin.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128110055/http:/www.stbride.org/conference2002/NonLatin.html)   
   
hhp
Thx for the links, But can someone find some examples of non-latin work for Linotype
have you tried google? its your friend ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128110055im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
Yes I tried. I find a lot of thing about fiona ross, But no real examples of fonts. I'm also not good at this subject.

Michael, if you send me your e-mail contact information (to tiro\<at\>tiro.com), I'll put you in touch with Fiona. Much of the work she did for Linotype is not currently available, as it has not been converted for today's technology yet, which is why you won't find much of it online. I'm sure Fiona would be happy to send you photocopies of old samples and answer your questions.
